text: Meghan Markle scored her first People's Choice Awards nomination on Wednesday in the Style Star of 2018 category. The 37 - year - old Duchess Of Sussex will compete in the category against Rihanna, Gigi Hadid, Zendaya, Blake Lively, Emma Watson, Beyonc√©, Harry Styles, Chadwick Boseman, Brooklyn Beckham, Jaden Smith and Chris Pine. Markle also was nominated in the Choice Style Icon category at the 2018 Teen Choice Awards. Scroll down for list of nominees Fan favorite : Meghan Markle, shown in July in London, was nominated on Wednesday for a People's Choice Award in the Style Icon category She lost out to 24 - year - old English singer and actor Styles during the awards ceremony last month at The Forum in Inglewood, California.
